channel.title: about on Tobias Weiss

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Tobias. I like to play my guitar(s). If the weather is good, I go jogging, biking or do other outdoor activities. Otherwise, I work out at the gym. I was raised in a small village in south-west Germany. My mother tongue is Swabian. However, I am also familiar with German and English. Swedish and French also works to some extent. Most IT things are fine for me.
